bulletin.description: The ESXi Utilities Offline bundle for VMware ESXi 7.0 includes HPONCFG, BOOTCFG, TESTEVENT, SSACLI and CONREP utilities for online configuration of servers. HPONCFG can be used to set up and reconfigure the iLO (Integrated Lights-Out) management controller of a server. BOOTCFG can be used to set up the boot configuration for the server. Conrep can be used for the Configuration Replication Utility. SSACLI can be used in the configuration of Smart Array controllers and attached storage.
